About

Welcome to DIGITAL DETOX where safety and support meet innovation. Our platform is dedicated to combating online toxicity and abuse through cutting-edge AI technology and compassionate support systems.
AI-Powered Protection: We use advanced AI models to identify and flag toxic comments, creating a safer digital space for all users.
Empowering Users: Our transparent rating system helps users make informed decisions about their interactions.
Seamless Protection: With our Chrome extension, offensive comments can be easily blurred, giving you control over your online experience.
Stay Informed: Receive real-time news headlines and email updates about the most toxic users, empowering you to stay vigilant and protect yourself and others.
24/7 Support: Our chatbot mentor is always available to provide emotional support and vital information, ensuring you feel supported and empowered in every situation.
